participant_1.background:
I try to find easy ways to make money.
I love new technology.
I really enjoy reading the news.
I like to create websites.
I wish i could play the stock market well.

participant_2.background:
I used to play hockey.
I have asthma.
I am 6 foot tall.
I love to dance.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to dance, I used to play hockey but had to stop because of asthma.
Oh, that's too bad. I like to read, and I'm trying to learn how to play the stock market.
Really, that's interesting. What kind of things do you like to read?
I like to read about technology, and I'm also interested in the news.
I love technology too! I'm always trying to find new gadgets and apps.
Me too! I'm really interested in how technology is changing the world.
Me too. I think it's amazing how we can now communicate with people all over the world in an instant.
It is amazing. I think it's also really cool how we can access information from anywhere in the world.
I agree. I love being able to learn about anything I want, whenever I want.
Me too. I think it's so important to stay informed about the world around us.
I agree. I think it's also important to be open to new ideas and perspectives.
I agree. I think that's what makes life so interesting.
Me too. I think it's important to always be learning and growing.
I agree. I think that's what makes life so much fun.
Me too. I think life is all about exploring and experiencing new things.
